text.text_translated: An asteroid is a small rock in space. An orbit is the path that an object takes around a planet or star. Asteroids that could be dangerous (PHAs) are those that pass within 7.5 million kilometres of Earth’s orbit. NASA has created a map of 1,400 of these asteroids. None of them are expected to be a threat in the next one hundred years. Technology is already available. NASA can track these objects and predict possible impacts. Then NASA can launch two defence solutions.

best_attempt.text_translated: An asteroid is a small rock in space. An orbit is the path that an object takes around a planet or star. Potentially Hazardous Asteroids (PHAs) are asteroids that pass within 7.5 million kilometres of Earth’s orbit. NASA has created a map of 1,400 PHAs, none of which are expected to be a threat in the next one hundred years. With technology already available, NASA can track these objects and make predictions about possible impact, at which point two defence solutions could be launched.
